title: #1: The Final Girls Film Festival
description:
The upcoming Final Girls Film Festival showcases horror cinema that's directed, written, or produced by women. Jill sits down with two of the Final Girls team members to discuss the origins of the festival, which films are being featured this year, how women are tokenized in the horror genre.

Final Girls is taking place from the 1st to 3rd of February at B-WARE store cinema at Gartnerstraße 19, 12045 Berlin.

www.finalgirlsberlin.com/about/
www.facebook.com/events/135401243820231/

Opening and closing music by For Joris.
